Family.title: Family
Family.description: Represents a family account within the Ascend Wealth application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Family entity.

familyName.description: The name of the family, typically the head's last name.

familyHeadName.description: The full name of the family head.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the family.

emailId.description: The email address of the family.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the family head.

anniversaryDate.description: The anniversary date of the family (optional).

panPhotoUrl.description: URL of the PAN photo document.

aadhaarPhotoUrl.description: URL of the Aadhaar photo document.

panFileName.description: File name of the PAN photo document.

aadhaarFileName.description: File name of the Aadhaar photo document.

otherDocumentFileName.description: File name of the other document.

definition.description: Stores family data. Includes information such as family head name, contact details, and document URLs.

params.name: familyId
params.description: Unique identifier for the family document.
